name: Giana Sisters FANGAME DEMO
description:
This is a passion project of mine. A fangame for the unlikely run 'n' jump series Giana Sisters, produced in Pixel Game Maker MV. This demo contains a single level for testing the waters and mechanics, and serves as a taste for what I would love to someday see to full fruition.

Features include:

  • New Moves! Giana now has the ability to back flip to reach new heights and jump in rhythm to move faster and farther.
  • Remixed Powers! Giana's iconic abilities will return with a familiar form factor, now all as power-ups to find within the stages.
  • Gem Bank! Collect as many gems as you can without dying to store them in a bank for use in the world map. (note: world map not yet implemented)

My eventual hope is to make this a story about Giana and her oft-forgotten sister Maria. To go along that would be to make Maria fully playable, with her own unique take on the controls, and an option for co-op play.

This is what I've been able to complete on my own. If you have any feedback, or even potentially want to join this dream project, don't hesitate to contact me.
